germeval_14.description: The GermEval 2014 NER Shared Task builds on a new dataset with German Named Entity annotation with the following properties:    - The data was sampled from German Wikipedia and News Corpora as a collection of citations.    - The dataset covers over 31,000 sentences corresponding to over 590,000 tokens.    - The NER annotation uses the NoSta-D guidelines, which extend the Tübingen Treebank guidelines,      using four main NER categories with sub-structure, and annotating embeddings among NEs      such as [ORG FC Kickers [LOC Darmstadt]].
